name: Frank Clem
text:
Fresh, airy and clean. Very well lit. Easy parking, convenient location.

Personell are friendly, likeable, polite and knowledgeable. They teach from beginner through advanced. Always make you feel comfortable; never let you be embarrassed.

Pricing is moderate and worth every penny.

resp.text: Thank you for your possitive feedback. We appreciate your thoughtful and kind remarks.

name: Sherry Luna
text: I have been a student at River Regions for many years now and it has been the absolute best thing I have ever done for myself.  The studio is clean and tastefully decorated, the music is grand, and the staff encouraging, patient, and devoted to making me happy while helping my dance skills to go beyond what I ever expected.  I have formed many friendships with other students, and the atmosphere is one of a caring family.

resp.text: Thank you kindly for your  review.  It is very nice ro know that we are accomplishing our goals. Our aim is to provide a safe, comfortable environment to help you reach your goal,   or even exceed them.

name: Demetrius Mills
text: Awesome place. The instructors are so professional and knowledgeable. The dance classes are so refreshing and awesome.  I have found a new love for dancing at River Region Ballroom Dance Studio.     The owner is the best.

resp.text: Thank you so much for your  possitive feedback. We are especially pleased to know that you are loving dance and enjoying the environment in which you are learning.

name: Scott Campbell
text:
Jim, Beverly, and the rest of the staff here have become like family to my wife and I.
Their instructors are excellent and patient. I no longer dance like I don't know what I'm doing!

resp.text: Thank you for your feedback. Our intention is for you feel like family. We hope you continue  to enjoy dancing throughout your life.
